courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: MCB 100 and MCB 101 or consent of instructor.
description: Consideration, through experimentation, of properties of bacteria, yeasts, molds, and actinomycetes important to industrial processes; exploration of methods of control of microbial processes in industry and sanitation. Prerequisite: MCB 100 and MCB 101 or consent of instructor.
label: Applied Microbiology Methods
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to BS:Fd Sci & Hmn Nutrn-FS -UIUC, BS:F Sc&Hum Nutrition-HN -UIUC, BS:F Sci&Hm Nutr-Diettcs -UIUC, or BS:FSci&Hm Nutr-Hosp Mgt -UIUC.
